reference.shortdesc: A user interface control is a label for an item that allows a person or tool to control an interface, such as a button, field, menu item, or other object.

section.title: Usage information
section.p: The uicontrol element is also used inside a menucascade element to identify a sequence of menu choices in a nested menu, such as File New .

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The uicontrol element is specialized from ph. It is defined in the user-interface domain module.
